pros: Contains 1mg of copper, an essential mineral that gets depleted from zinc
Noticeable difference in hair and nail growth and reduction of acne
cons: Copper addition is unwanted for those without copper deficiency

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Just Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: I really doubt that you need to take this daily if you have a decent diet. Maybe if you had a zinc deficiency this would be helpful to take daily, but I think for the average person - one capsule a week will do just fine. I find that if I take this more than once to twice a week - that I get very agitated and angry. If however, I take it sparingly - I feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Do you think you are lactose intolerant?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. We were spending tons of money on lactaid. It would sometimes work, but not consistent. After a brief, although insightful, conversation with my health nut brother, he turned me onto this. Zero problems for 7 months. If you think you may have become lactose intolerant in the adult years, it may just be low Zinc. Don’t just run out and by high dose Zinc. This is more than enough and it has to have copper to offset some of the overpowering affects of Zinc. Copper helps with the absorption of zinc as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I take one of these every day that I remember. I have been doing it for about three months. The best thing I noticed is that I have no under arm odor, not even when I sweat. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Eat it with food
customer_reviews.text: THIS HAS GONE UP FROM $6 TO $30 f-ing dollars. What is wrong with this system. I don’t understand what kind of karma j.b. Is gonna get. “It goes down well and definitely eat it with food.” (Hopefully saying that will get me to print this asinine price gauge)
customer_reviews.author: $mazon Customer because I‘m passive aggressive

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Since taking this, my allergy symptoms have almost disappeared! I am really happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri B

customer_reviews.title: Includes Necessary Copper in Balance
customer_reviews.text: I used to just use a Zinc supplement, until I learned more about the mineral. Turns out there's a critical balance between zinc and copper. Taking only the zinc can throw that balance out of whack. I read what the best ratio should be between zinc and copper, then searched for someone who makes that as a single supplement. Jarrow came through once again, with excellent science. These are affordable, and I feel a lot better knowing I'm not messing up the mineral ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L

customer_reviews.title: Maybe best taken on a full stomach, otherwise - careful!!!

I do not take it daily as my multi has some zinc. I am still rating thus 5 stars based on my experience.

I didn't realize that with this disease, you're usually deficient in zinc. I started using this a few weeks ago and I feel like I have a little more energy than usual (which is HUGE for me) and my hair fall has slowed tremendously in the shower. I have high hopes now from what I've seen. I'll continue to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: increases blood levels quickly, helps with dry, scaly skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. My blood levels went from 60 to 100 ug/dL in just 5 weeks (2 capsules per day). Prior to this I was taking zinc picolinate for 2 1/2 months, which increased my levels from 50 to 60. So not by much. Also, I have had dry, scaly skin on my elbows for some years now, that is now gone. Woot!
customer_reviews.author: Leckerli

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to supplement zinc for immunity and skin reasons and after a bit of looking around, chose this brand. I think in general this brand has top-quality ingredients, often branded ingredients, and is sold at a fair price. So, I don't have anything more profound to say about this product, but I do think it's good and that I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Slow Moving Fun Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but be careful...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good way to "balance" your zinc and copper ratios, but this product had too much copper for me. Virtually no one is deficient in copper, as it is in dark chocolate, water (if you don't filter it), virtually all foods, really. You don't want too much copper in your system, as higher intakes of copper are associated with alzheimer's. I recommend finding a low (15> mg) zinc only supplement if you are looking to get enough zinc. Keep track of your nutrients with a good nutrition tracker like Cronometer (it's free!) to understand just how much of these minerals you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous smell!!! Will not be reordering this.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the good reviews prior to buying this product and took a plunge and ordered it myself. Upon opening the bottle I instantly realised that this supplement has horrendous smell that turns my stomach inside out and makes me gag! I am surprised nobody mentioned this in the review because I should not have ordered it, I force myself to take it now that I do have it but rest assured I will not be ordering another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CaptivatingCurls

customer_reviews.title: Testosterone Spike
customer_reviews.text: I had to reproduce the results consistently before I did this review. I felt my testosterone spike every 2-4 hrs after consuming 1 fish oil and 1 Zinc/copper from Jarrow. Ranging from different times of the day ranging from 1pm to 4pm and from 6pm to 10pm to make sure it wasn't a natural time of the day spike. Today I'll try 2x Zinc but this is definitely worth a go. The last time I felt something this strong was when my doctor put me on Test Gel for a month, which makes you feel like superman and really good but I wanted to address the issue rather than bandaiding a potential imbalance naturally.
customer_reviews.author: GOD's Soldier

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! My nails are much stronger
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! My nails are much stronger. My hair grows fast and after being on these for a couple of months I noticed my hair was growing even faster....but the best surprise of all is that after 10 months of use I noticed that there was significantly less gray in my hair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Another Quality Product from Jarrow
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with this product and others I have purchased from Jarrow. As the manufacturer states: Zinc Balance is a synergistic combination of Zinc L-Monomethionine and Copper Gluconate in a 15:1 ratio. Zinc L-Monomethionine resists absorption interference from fiber and phytic acid. The mineral zinc promotes skeletal and immune health. Both zinc and copper are needed to promote super oxide dismutase (SOD) activity; which plays a critical role in the body's endogenous antioxidant network. Keep out of the reach of children. Jarrow products are made in California.
customer_reviews.author: The Tally Ho

Must say it took affect within 20 minutes of me taking it. Super scared to try it again. I won't rate bad bc it was my choice not to take it with food and it just affected me this way.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a super boost to the immunity system
customer_reviews.text: My kids take this all winter long and they have avoided getting the flu, stomach flu, sinus infection, a 14 day cold, and bronchitis. My oldest couldn’t swallow pills but these are so tiny that she learned to swallows these pills first. Taking the zinc, this really cuts down the length of time getting sick to one bad day instead of dragging it along for 2 weeks. My child has asthma and even getting a cold will make it hard for her to sleep and breathe at night. She barely got sick the whole school season where she was sick every month without theses wonderful pills.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Zinc is important to healthy immure system, which is critical during the Covid 19 pandemic. However, taking too much zinc can interfere with absorption and function of cooper, which is also necessary to cell health. The daily recommended total dose of zinc is 20 mg to avoid interfering with cooper. Assuming there is some zinc in your diet, the 15 mg in this preparation seems a good choice. Small capsules, easy to swallow.

customer_reviews.author: Serge Heidegger

customer_reviews.title: Restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: I take this produce before bed every few days, I feel great when I wake up, as the zinc helps me achieve a deep and restful sleep. This form of zinc is much more bio-available (absorbed by the body) than the regular zinc salts. Zinc can help clear up acne by increasing the production of RBP in the liver. RBP is responsible for transferring vitamin A to the tissues (including skin). ([...]) Also, the quality of Jarrow products is top notch. I use many of their products and do notice a difference compared to inferior products. Worth a purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The best product ever
customer_reviews.text: Tried a lot of different product, this one is tops

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes in such a low dose. Higher doses can upset your stomach.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. The pill isn't too big and has just enough for a daily's worth
customer_reviews.author: readingmama

product_meta.title: Jarrow Formulas Zinc Balance 15 mg, Supports Immune and Antioxidant Protection, 100 Caps
product_meta.description:
Zinc Balance is a synergistic combination of Zinc L-Methionine and Copper Gluconate in a 15:1 ratio of zinc to copper. Zinc L-Methionine resists absorption interference from fiber and phytic acid.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Zinc Balance is a synergistic combination of Zinc L-Monomethionine and Copper Gluconate in a 15:1 ratio. Zinc L-Monomethionine resists absorption interference from fiber and phytic acid. The mineral zinc promotes skeletal and immune health. Both zinc and copper are needed to promote super oxide dismutase (SOD) activity; which plays a critical role in the body's endogenous antioxidant network. Keep out of the reach of children.
feature_bullets: 15 mg of Zinc per serving, 140% Daily Value
No wheat, no gluten, no soybeans, no dairy, no egg, no fish/shellfish, no peanuts/tree nuts.

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
